sentences.sContent: "I don't want people to call her (her daughter) a bastard and abuse my brothers.My brothers won't have honour in our society until he marries me," she says.
sentences.sContent_eng: "I don't want people to call her (her daughter) a bastard and abuse my brothers.My brothers won't have honour in our society until he marries me," she says.
sentences.sCn: “我并不希望人们称她（我的女儿）是私生子，也不希望人们辱骂我的表哥，他在我们国家将无法受人尊敬，除非他同我结婚”，她说。

words.tran: 退化非纯种的；非正宗的
判为私生子；误用；使退化（bastardize的过去分词）
使…品质低落；判定…为私生子

trans.tranOther: someone who was born to parents who were not married
